title: Bubblegum
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lickin' the barrel of a gun
Chewin' it like it's bubblegum
Wave it like a magic wand
Pop a few rounds off just for fun
[Verse 2]
Go to the strip club all alone
Thinkin' that I could take you home
To picture you with those other guys
Is drivin' me crazy all the time
[Chorus]
Well, I never wanted to be with you
But I think I'm falling, so what can I do?
You'll just lead me on 'til I'm drowning in tears
[Bridge]
Oh, and you're holdin' me
Oh, and you're holdin' me
Oh, and you're holdin' me
As if I was the
Last man standing on earth
[Chorus]
Well, I never wanted to be with you
But I think I'm falling, so what can I do?
You'll just lead me on 'til I'm drowning in tears
